channel.title: Phloem on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Phloem on funPlantGenes

item.title: AgMaT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AgMaT2 Gene Name: mannitol transporter 2 Genome: Species: Apium graveolens Functional Descriptions: Characterization of AgMaT2, a Plasma Membrane Mannitol Transporter from Celery, Expressed in Phloem Cells, Including Phloem Parenchyma Cells.

item.title: BdERECTA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g46450 Gene Symbol: BdERECTA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdERECTA controls vasculature patterning and phloem-xylem organization in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: ClVST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G031010 Gene Symbol: ClVST1 Gene Name: vacuolar sugar transporter Genome: watermelon genome database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Report a novel vacuolar sugar transporter (ClVST1) identified through map-based cloning and association study, whose expression in fruit phloem is associated with accumulation of sucrose (Suc) in watermelon fruit.

item.title: CsPPSR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G009550 Gene Symbol: CsPPSR1 Gene Name: Phloem Phosphate Stress-Repressed 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A cucumber protein, Phloem Phosphate Stress-Repressed 1(CsPPSR1), rapidly degrades in response to a phosphate stress.

item.title: CsSUS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa5G322500 Gene Symbol: CsSUS4 Gene Name: Sucrose Synthase 4 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-Regulating Cucumber Sucrose Synthase 4 (CsSUS4) Suppresses the Growth and Development of Flowers and Fruits.

item.title: CsSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUT1 Gene Name: Sucrose Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the Sucrose Transporter CsSUT1 Causes Male Sterility by Altering Carbohydrate Supply.

item.title: ShSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ShSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 1 Genome: Species: Saccharum hybrid Functional Descriptions: Here we present a functional analysis of the SUT ShSUT1 from sugarcane, an important crop species grown for its ability to accumulate high amounts of sucrose in the stem.

item.title: SlCyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCyp1 Gene Name: low-temperature-induced cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that, in tomato, translocation of a phloem-mobile cyclophilin, SlCyp1, from a wild-type scion into a mutant rootstock results in restoration of vascular development and lateral root initiation.

item.title: SlFRK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlFRK3 Gene Name: fructokinase3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato plastidic fructokinase SlFRK3 plays a role in xylem development.

item.title: StBEL5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StBEL5 Gene Name: BEL1-related homeotic protein 5 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The level of StBEL5 mRNA increased in response to a short-day photoperiod in both leaves and stolons.

item.title: StSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transport protein1 Genome: Species: Solanaceae tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The Potato Sucrose Transporter StSUT1 Interacts with a DRM-Associated Protein Disulfide Isomerase.
